hero.headline: Connecting Health Beyond Borders.
hero.subheadline: C.H. Oriented builds connection-driven healthcare systems integrating medical expertise, global patient networks, and digital infrastructure.

about.title: About
about.philosophyBody: We believe healthcare should be connected, precise, and built for long-term value. C.H. Oriented operates at the intersection of clinical excellence, global patient networks, and structured innovation to deliver scalable medical systems beyond a single clinic model.
about.missionBody: Our mission is to build connection-driven healthcare infrastructure that integrates medical expertise, cross-border patient coordination, and digital tools. We aim to be a long-term platform company that enables structured, scalable health systems worldwide.
about.founderBody: C.H. Oriented was founded on the conviction that healthcare infrastructure must be connection-driven and built to scale. We are not a single clinic—we are a platform company focused on integrating medical expertise, global patient networks, and digital systems to create lasting value for partners and patients alike.

ctaBanner.headline: Ready to build the future of healthcare?
ctaBanner.body: Partner with C.H. Oriented to integrate medical expertise, global networks, and scalable digital systems.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: C.H. Oriented is a healthcare infrastructure company focused on building structured, scalable, connection-oriented medical systems. We integrate clinical expertise, global patient networks, and digital tools to create lasting value beyond a single clinic model.
faq.q2: How is this different from a clinic?
faq.a2: Unlike a traditional clinic, C.H. Oriented operates as a platform company. We build the systems, networks, and infrastructure that enable multiple healthcare operations to scale — including cross-border patient coordination, medical device development, and digital health tools.
faq.a3: We offer strategic partnerships across our four divisions: clinical collaboration, patient network integration, device co-development, and digital infrastructure licensing. Each model is tailored to the partner's goals and regional context.
faq.q4: Which countries do you operate in?
faq.a4: C.H. Oriented currently operates across 5+ countries with a focus on South Korea, Japan, and Southeast Asia. Our expansion roadmap includes additional markets in Asia-Pacific and beyond.
faq.q5: How does the Global Patient Network work?
faq.a5: Our Global Patient Network connects patients with specialized medical services across borders. We handle coordination, translation, logistics, and follow-up care through a structured system designed for seamless cross-border healthcare experiences.
faq.q6: How can I become a partner?
faq.a6: Submit a partnership inquiry through our contact form or email us at partnership@choriented.com. Our team will review your inquiry and schedule a consultation to explore alignment and collaboration opportunities.
